about_the_game:
mod version of "english", including the translation of this DLC.

Game acceleration, irrelevant attributes

This DLC includes two systems:
1. Drawing system: 6 different types of paper can be made. Increase the revenue multiplier or speed and drop rate of some systems in the game. Each action automatically consumes one piece of paper.
2. Sacred Symbol system: 6 kinds of sacred symbols can be developed for a long time (same as the above function), providing permanent bonus.
The above two can be combined to increase the revenue speed by about 10 times at most.
Almost no final character stats are affected, except for the bonus provided by Door Reiki!

The six acceleration directions include:
1. Improve the speed of cultivation.
2. Increase the speed of enlightenment.
3. Increase experience wild monster combat attack rate.
4. Increase skill experience multiplier.
5. Increases the chance of secret realms falling.
6. Increase the spirit crystal drop ratio of beast tide.
